item.title: Openwhisk Logstash Forwarder
item.description: Debugging serverless applications in production is often reliant on application logs, due to having no access to the runtime environment. No SSHing into the machine and attaching a debugger to a process or using strace to dump system calls. Storing, searching and analysing serverless application logs is crucial to diagnosing and fixing bugs on serverless platforms. The “ELK Stack” has become a popular solution for managing applications logs. Combining three open-source projects (ElasticSearch, Logstash and Kibana), this solution provides a scalable platform for importing, storing and searching application logs.
